text: Malcolm Irving Glazer (August 15, 1928 - May 28, 2014) was an American businessman and sports team owner. He was the president and chief executive officer of First Allied Corporation. He also owned both the association football club Manchester United of the English Premier League and the American football team Tampa Bay Buccaneers of the NFL. Glazer was born in Rochester, New York to Lithuanian Jewish immigrants. Glazer was married to Linda from 1961 until his death. The couple had five sons together: Avram, Kevin, Bryan, Joel, Edward; and a daughter, Darcie. Glazer died on May 28, 2014 in Palm Beach, Florida, aged 85.
